name: WarGreymon
effect: [When Digivolving] This Digimon gains ＜Security Attack +1＞ (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card) for the turn.[Your Turn] This Digimon doesn't activate [Security] skills on Option cards it checks.
notes: PB-12E: Digimon Card Game 2nd Anniversary Set

name: MagnaAngemon
effect: [On Play] ＜Recovery +1 (Deck)＞ (Place the top card of your deck on top of your security stack).
digivolveEffect: [Your Turn] This Digimon gets +1000 DP for every 3 security cards you have.
notes: PB-12E: Digimon Card Game 2nd Anniversary Set

name: Imperialdramon Dragon Mode
effect: When one of your [Paildramon] or [Dinobeemon] would digivolve into this card in your hand, reduce the memory cost of the digivolution by 2.＜Jamming＞ (This Digimon can't be deleted in battles against Security Digimon).[When Digivolving] Unsuspend all of your Digimon with ＜Jamming＞.
notes: PB-12E: Digimon Card Game 2nd Anniversary Set

name: Craniamon
effect: ＜Blocker＞ (When an opponent's Digimon attacks, you may suspend this Digimon to force the opponent to attack it instead).[All Turns] Your Digimon with ＜Blocker＞ can't be deleted by your opponent's effects.
notes: PB-12E: Digimon Card Game 2nd Anniversary Set

name: Lilithmon
effect: [When Digivolving] If you have 10 or more cards in your trash, you may return up to 2 purple Option cards from your trash to your hand.[Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When you use an Option card, gain 2 memory.
notes: PB-12E: Digimon Card Game 2nd Anniversary Set

name: Omnimon
effect: [When Digivolving] Choose 1 of your opponent's Digimon. Delete all of your opponent's Digimon that share a name with it.[When Attacking] You can unsuspend this Digimon by returning 1 of this Digimon's level 6 digivolution cards to your hand.
notes: PB-12E: Digimon Card Game 2nd Anniversary Set

name: Holy Wave
effect: [Main] ＜Recovery +1 (Deck)＞ (Place the top card of your deck on top of your security stack).
notes: PB-12E: Digimon Card Game 2nd Anniversary Set

name: Breath of the Gods
effect: [Main] 1 of your Digimon gains ＜Reboot＞ (Unsuspend this Digimon during your opponent's unsuspend phase) and "This Digimon can't have its DP reduced or be returned to its owner's hand or deck" until the end of your opponent's next turn.
digivolveEffect: [Security] Your opponent's Digimon can't attack players for the turn.
notes: PB-12E: Digimon Card Game 2nd Anniversary Set

name: Agumon
effect: [On Play] Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 3000 DP or less.
notes: PB-12E: Digimon Card Game 2nd Anniversary Set

name: Biyomon
digivolveEffect: [Your Turn] When this Digimon deletes one of your opponent's Digimon in battle and survives, ＜Draw 1＞ (Draw 1 card from your deck).
notes: PB-12E: Digimon Card Game 2nd Anniversary Set

name: Gabumon
effect: [On Play] Trash the bottom digivolution card of 1 of your opponent's Digimon.
notes: PB-12E: Digimon Card Game 2nd Anniversary Set

name: Gomamon
digivolveEffect: [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When one of your opponent's digivolution cards is trashed, gain 1 memory.
notes: PB-12E: Digimon Card Game 2nd Anniversary Set

name: Patamon
effect: [On Play] If you have 1 or fewer security cards, ＜Recovery +1 (Deck)＞ (Place the top card of your deck on top of your security stack).
notes: PB-12E: Digimon Card Game 2nd Anniversary Set

name: Gatomon
digivolveEffect: [Your Turn] While you have 3 or more security cards, this Digimon gets +1000 DP.
notes: PB-12E: Digimon Card Game 2nd Anniversary Set

name: Agunimon
effect: [When Attacking] This Digimon can digivolve into an [AncientGreymon] in your hand for a memory cost of 2, ignoring its digivolution requirements. If it does, delete this Digimon at the end of the turn.
digivolveEffect: [Your Turn] When you would digivolve this Digimon into an [AncientGreymon] in your hand, reduce its digivolution cost by 2.
notes: PB-12E: Digimon Card Game 2nd Anniversary Set

name: Lobomon
effect: [When Digivolving] This Digimon can digivolve into an [AncientGarurumon] in your hand for a memory cost of 1, ignoring its digivolution requirements. If it does, delete this Digimon at the end of the turn.
digivolveEffect: [Your Turn] When you would digivolve this Digimon into an [AncientGarurumon] in your hand, reduce its digivolution cost by 2.
notes: PB-12E: Digimon Card Game 2nd Anniversary Set

name: Kumamon
effect: You may digivolve this card from your hand onto one of your blue Tamers as if the Tamer is a level 3 blue Digimon.[When Digivolving] Trash 1 digivolution card from the bottom of 1 of your opponent's Digimon.
notes: PB-12E: Digimon Card Game 2nd Anniversary Set

name: Kazemon
effect: You may digivolve this card from your hand onto one of your yellow Tamers as if the Tamer is a level 3 yellow Digimon.
notes: PB-12E: Digimon Card Game 2nd Anniversary Set

name: Beetlemon
effect: You may digivolve this card from your hand onto one of your green Tamers as if the Tamer is a level 3 green Digimon.[When Digivolving] Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Add 1 card with the [Hybrid] trait and 1 [J.P. Shibayama] among them to your hand. Place the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.
notes: PB-12E: Digimon Card Game 2nd Anniversary Set

name: Loweemon
effect: You may digivolve this card from your hand onto one of your purple Tamers as if the Tamer is a level 3 purple Digimon.
notes: PB-12E: Digimon Card Game 2nd Anniversary Set

name: Neemon
effect: [On Play] You may play 1 Tamer card with an inherited effect from your hand without paying its memory cost.[All Turns] [Once Per Turn] When one of your Digimon with a Tamer card in its digivolution cards is deleted, you may play 1 Tamer card from your trash without paying its memory cost.
notes: PB-12E: Digimon Card Game 2nd Anniversary Set

name: Bokomon
effect: [On Play] Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Add 1 card with the [Hybrid] or [Ten Warriors] trait and 1 Tamer card among them to your hand. Place the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.[Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When one of your Tamers digivolves, gain 2 memory.
notes: PB-12E: Digimon Card Game 2nd Anniversary Set
